verses.verse: And the LORD <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> unto <WH413> Moses, <WH4872> saying, <WH559>

Send <WH7971> thou men, <WH376> that they may search <WH8446> <WH853> the land <WH776> of Canaan, <WH3667> which <WH834> I <WH589> give <WH5414> unto the children <WH1121> of Israel: <WH3478> of every tribe <WH4294> of their fathers <WH1> shall ye send <WH7971> a <WH259> man, <WH376> every one <WH3605> a ruler <WH5387> among them.

And Moses <WH4872> by <WH5921> the commandment <WH6310> of the LORD <WH3068> sent <WH7971> them from the wilderness <WH4480> <WH4057> of Paran: <WH6290> all <WH3605> those <WH1992> men <WH376> were heads <WH7218> of the children <WH1121> of Israel. <WH3478>
And these <WH428> were their names: <WH8034> of the tribe <WH4294> of Reuben, <WH7205> Shammua <WH8051> the son <WH1121> of Zaccur. <WH2139>
Of the tribe <WH4294> of Simeon, <WH8095> Shaphat <WH8202> the son <WH1121> of Hori. <WH2753>
Of the tribe <WH4294> of Judah, <WH3063> Caleb <WH3612> the son <WH1121> of Jephunneh. <WH3312>
Of the tribe <WH4294> of Issachar, <WH3485> Igal <WH3008> the son <WH1121> of Joseph. <WH3130>
Of the tribe <WH4294> of Ephraim, <WH669> Oshea <WH1954> the son <WH1121> of Nun. <WH5126>
Of the tribe <WH4294> of Benjamin, <WH1144> Palti <WH6406> the son <WH1121> of Raphu. <WH7505>
Of the tribe <WH4294> of Zebulun, <WH2074> Gaddiel <WH1427> the son <WH1121> of Sodi. <WH5476>
Of the tribe <WH4294> of Joseph, <WH3130> namely, of the tribe <WH4294> of Manasseh, <WH4519> Gaddi <WH1426> the son <WH1121> of Susi. <WH5485>
Of the tribe <WH4294> of Dan, <WH1835> Ammiel <WH5988> the son <WH1121> of Gemalli. <WH1582>
Of the tribe <WH4294> of Asher, <WH836> Sethur <WH5639> the son <WH1121> of Michael. <WH4317>
Of the tribe <WH4294> of Naphtali, <WH5321> Nahbi <WH5147> the son <WH1121> of Vophsi. <WH2058>
Of the tribe <WH4294> of Gad, <WH1410> Geuel <WH1345> the son <WH1121> of Machi. <WH4352>

These <WH428> are the names <WH8034> of the men <WH376> which <WH834> Moses <WH4872> sent <WH7971> to spy out <WH8446> <WH853> the land. <WH776> And Moses <WH4872> called <WH7121> Oshea <WH1954> the son <WH1121> of Nun <WH5126> Joshua. <WH3091>

And Moses <WH4872> sent <WH7971> them to spy out <WH8446> <WH853> the land <WH776> of Canaan, <WH3667> and said <WH559> unto <WH413> them, Get you up <WH5927> this <WH2088> way southward, <WH5045> and go up <WH5927> into <WH854> the mountain: <WH2022>

And see <WH7200> <WH853> the land, <WH776> what <WH4100> it <WH1931> is; and the people <WH5971> that dwelleth <WH3427> therein, <WH5921> whether they <WH1931> be strong <WH2389> or weak, <WH7504> few <WH4592> or <WH518> many; <WH7227>

And what <WH4100> the land <WH776> is that <WH834> they <WH1931> dwell <WH3427> in whether it <WH1931> be good <WH2896> or <WH518> bad; <WH7451> and what <WH4100> cities <WH5892> they be that <WH834> they <WH1931> dwell <WH3427> in, <WH2007> whether in tents, <WH4264> or <WH518> in strongholds; <WH4013>

And what <WH4100> the land <WH776> is, whether it <WH1931> be fat <WH8082> or <WH518> lean, <WH7330> whether there be <WH3426> wood <WH6086> therein, or <WH518> not. <WH369> And be ye of good courage, <WH2388> and bring <WH3947> of the fruit <WH4480> <WH6529> of the land. <WH776> Now the time <WH3117> was the time <WH3117> of the firstripe <WH1061> grapes. <WH6025>
So they went up, <WH5927> and searched <WH8446> <WH853> the land <WH776> from the wilderness <WH4480> <WH4057> of Zin <WH6790> unto <WH5704> Rehob, <WH7340> as men come <WH935> to Hamath. <WH2574>

And they ascended <WH5927> by the south, <WH5045> and came <WH935> unto <WH5704> Hebron; <WH2275> where <WH8033> Ahiman, <WH289> Sheshai, <WH8344> and Talmai, <WH8526> the children <WH3211> of Anak, <WH6061> were. (Now Hebron <WH2275> was built <WH1129> seven <WH7651> years <WH8141> before <WH6440> Zoan <WH6814> in Egypt.) <WH4714>

And they came <WH935> unto <WH5704> the brook <WH5158> of Eshcol, <WH812> and cut down <WH3772> from thence <WH4480> <WH8033> a branch <WH2156> with one <WH259> cluster <WH811> of grapes, <WH6025> and they bore <WH5375> it between two <WH8147> upon a staff; <WH4132> and they brought of <WH4480> the pomegranates, <WH7416> and of <WH4480> the figs. <WH8384>

The place <WH4725> was called <WH7121> the brook <WH5158> Eshcol, <WH812> because <WH5921> <WH182> of the cluster of grapes <WH811> which <WH834> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> cut down <WH3772> from thence. <WH4480> <WH8033>
And they returned <WH7725> from searching <WH4480> <WH8446> of the land <WH776> after <WH4480> <WH7093> forty <WH705> days. <WH3117>

And they went <WH1980> and came <WH935> to <WH413> Moses, <WH4872> and to <WH413> Aaron, <WH175> and to <WH413> all <WH3605> the congregation <WH5712> of the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> unto <WH413> the wilderness <WH4057> of Paran, <WH6290> to Kadesh; <WH6946> and brought back <WH7725> word <WH1697> unto them, and unto all <WH3605> the congregation, <WH5712> and showed <WH7200> them <WH853> the fruit <WH6529> of the land. <WH776>

And they told <WH5608> him, and said, <WH559> We came <WH935> unto <WH413> the land <WH776> whither <WH834> thou sentest <WH7971> us, and surely <WH1571> it <WH1931> floweth <WH2100> with milk <WH2461> and honey; <WH1706> and this <WH2088> is the fruit <WH6529> of it.

Nevertheless <WH657> <WH3588> the people <WH5971> be strong <WH5794> that dwell <WH3427> in the land, <WH776> and the cities <WH5892> are walled, <WH1219> and very <WH3966> great: <WH1419> and moreover <WH1571> we saw <WH7200> the children <WH3211> of Anak <WH6061> there. <WH8033>

The Amalekites <WH6003> dwell <WH3427> in the land <WH776> of the south: <WH5045> and the Hittites, <WH2850> and the Jebusites, <WH2983> and the Amorites, <WH567> dwell <WH3427> in the mountains: <WH2022> and the Canaanites <WH3669> dwell <WH3427> by <WH5921> the sea, <WH3220> and by <WH5921> the coast <WH3027> of Jordan. <WH3383>

And Caleb <WH3612> stilled <WH2013> <WH853> the people <WH5971> before <WH413> Moses, <WH4872> and said, <WH559> Let us go up at once, <WH5927> <WH5927> and possess <WH3423> it; for <WH3588> we are well able <WH3201> to overcome <WH3201> it.

But the men <WH376> that <WH834> went up <WH5927> with <WH5973> him said, <WH559> We be not able <WH3201> <WH3808> to go up <WH5927> against <WH413> the people; <WH5971> for <WH3588> they <WH1931> are stronger <WH2389> than <WH4480> we.

And they brought up <WH3318> an evil report <WH1681> of the land <WH776> which <WH834> they had searched <WH8446> unto <WH413> the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> saying, <WH559> The land, <WH776> through which <WH834> we have gone <WH5674> to search <WH8446> it, is a land <WH776> that <WH1931> eateth up <WH398> the inhabitants <WH3427> thereof; and all <WH3605> the people <WH5971> that <WH834> we saw <WH7200> in <WH8432> it are men <WH376> of a great stature. <WH4060>

And there <WH8033> we saw <WH7200> <WH853> the giants, <WH5303> the sons <WH1121> of Anak, <WH6061> which come of <WH4480> the giants: <WH5303> and we were <WH1961> in our own sight <WH5869> as grasshoppers, <WH2284> and so <WH3651> we were <WH1961> in their sight. <WH5869>
